scripts.install-plugins: cd mobile && cordova plugin add https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-camera.git && cordova plugin add https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-splashscreen.git && cordova plugin add de.appplant.cordova.plugin.local-notification
scripts.android: adb uninstall fr.cdiscount.pokt && gulp build:mobile && cd mobile && cocoonjs run android
scripts.ios: gulp build:mobile && cd mobile && cocoonjs build ios
scripts.clean: cd mobile && rm -rf platforms plugins hooks && mkdir hooks && echo 'dummy' > hooks/dummy
scripts.redeploy: npm run-script clean && npm run-script install-plugins
scripts.redeploy-android: npm run-script redeploy && cd mobile && cocoonjs platform add android
scripts.redeploy-ios: npm run-script redeploy && cd mobile && cocoonjs platform add ios && cordova plugin add de.appplant.cordova.plugin.hidden-statusbar-overlay
scripts.redeploy-android-webviewplus: npm run-script redeploy-android && cd mobile && cocoonjs plugin add com.ludei.webview.plus
